website_summaries.verdict: This is an impressive massage oil for anyone with sensitive skin, with a desirable consistency and scent as well.
pros: This oil is gentle enough to be used on even sensitive skin
Has a pleasant but light scent that isn’t overpowering
Oil warms up quickly in hands
Doesn’t absorb into skin too quickly
Has a thin consistency but it’s greasy

customer_reviews.title: Bottle not properly sealed.
customer_reviews.text: Product was not properly sealed. Leaked half of the bottle on box. Can not return.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and good for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I Got this for my husband and I and we both really like it. It smells sooooooo good, very relaxing - but it's not overpowering. I have chronic migraines and they're easily triggered by strong smells...why do people insist on bathing in perfume?! Anyway, this smells heavenly and does nothing to anger my head. I also have a connective tissue disorder (I know, I'm a mess) which makes my skin unbelievably sensitive. I break out if someone just looks at me the wrong way so trying this was a risk. Turns out I didn't need to worry, my husband has given me a bunch of back massages and not one pimple has reared it's ugly head!
customer_reviews.author: David & Emily Kilmer

customer_reviews.title: Gf loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend told me this was one of my best purchases on Amazon and that I should put it on auto refill haha. This stuff is not too greasy but oily enough to allow your hands to glide easily which makes giving a massage much more effortless. Smell is mild and the oil isn’t too messy and absorbs nicely. A little of this stuff goes a long way and I imagine I can get 30-40 massages out of this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Sonsam

customer_reviews.title: You should absolutely give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is perfectly sexy. The scent and slight tingle are very heightening to the senses. I really love to use this when we get started playing! It sets the stage very well. The slight tingle I mentioned is not a burning sensation like cooling or warming lubes. I feel like it just makes my skin and the area hypersensitive - which I enjoy! This oil doesn't really have a taste or at least it doesn't bother us. This oil is definitely worth the {low} price. It stands out in this category for sensual massage oil. I would love to try some of the other oils and scents this seller offers. You should absolutely give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great massage oil!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend and I for giving backrubs and it really works great! It has a very mild and pleasant smell and. Not strong or overpowering at all. The oil really does absorb into the skin pretty readily and it moisturizes very well. Even with your skin drinking up the oil you don't really need much to do a full back massage. We've gotten a LOT of use out of it. It's not greasy at all and doesn't leave any residue that I have noticed. I've tried maybe half a dozen massage oils so far and this one is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Andy G

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell, very little residue.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use it for "sensual massage," just normal, non-sensual ones, and it's really good. The smell is FANTASTIC, smells much more expensive than it is. I was worried it might smell a little bit like old lady perfume, but it smells like lavender and is very relaxing. Jojoba oil is great for your skin and didn't leave much residue behind - some, yes, because it is oil, but I have never felt straight-up greasy using this. I break out easily, and my skin didn't react at all to this. I've also used it in baths with good results. I plan to get more when my current bottle runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Caso

customer_reviews.title: Too much fragrance and a leaky bottle cap
customer_reviews.text: The oil is fine, but there are two bad things about this product: 1. it has too much fragrance. I expected something more subtle, not an overpowering scent. 2. the container leaks from the cap. After you snap the cap open, the oil flows out from the base of the cap as well. Hence, only three stars for this Sensual Massage Oil with Pure Lavender Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lotion! I’ve been buying bath and body stress ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing lotion! I’ve been buying bath and body stress massage oil for years and have been so disappointed in how much I use so quickly due to it really rubbing in skin too fast. Used this lotion on my husbands back last night for first time and we were both so impressed! Went on smooth and only a little bit lasted a long time! The smell is amazing like a spa! My husband slept so hard last night he loved it. Also he has psoriasis and has no issues with it. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: charles smith

customer_reviews.title: great for massage and sex, no sticky feeling which is great
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for many reasons and have used it over the last 2 years. It has a scent that I enjoy and my boyfriend likes it too, mild enough for both sexes. It also last for a while and leaves no sticky residue which is typical for personal lubricants like KY or Astroglide.
customer_reviews.author: lucabucca

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, sensual, healing and aromatic
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite sensual massage oil! I love the way it feels - smooth, just the right amount of slippery, soaks in slow and makes my skin feel great. the aroma is wonderful and does not cause any allergic reactions to my very sensitive skin. My wife and I have started rubbing it on each other's backs after showers it feels so good. I have even shaved using it and it works well for that too.
customer_reviews.author: John Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing scent texture and nice price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my girlfriend, who by the way LOVES the smell of lavender. The oil worked well and helped me massage her back. It was a cool, refreshing feeling and smell, however it did seem to evaporate after a while, but a little goes a long way so its all good. The price is decent, at least seems to be for me, so, I am content with the purchase. I definitely got brownie points for thinking of this product haha. So guys, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: It feels like it warms up after a few passes
customer_reviews.text: You do not need to use a large amount of the oil to accomplish the job. It feels like it warms up after a few passes. She was very pleased with the feel and smell. I will purchase more when I need to resupply!! I recommend if you have not tried this product you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Very good aroma but becomes thickens and becomes sticky quickly
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way the oil left some tension to manipulate the skin and muscles and help to open the joints. The problem is how thick and sticky it becomes. I will try cutting this with other thin oils to prevent the this oil from drying out so quickly. My clients loved the aroma but complained of the sticky feeling and needed a shower after the massage. All my clients like my other oils that soak into their skin leaving a smooth and healthy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best massage oil!
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! Slides right on and doesn’t leave a mess! Smells amazing too! 10/10 recommendation
customer_reviews.author: Love this!

customer_reviews.title: Terrible return options
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was busted. No option to return this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Abktexas

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct oil in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I am highly disappointed. This is my second time ordering this product, the first time I got it I absolutely loved it, very nice lavender scent and I used it every day. This time, the bottle looks a little different and it literally smells like Teatree oil, nothing like lavender. So I don’t know who was putting the oil in these bottles but it’s definitely not the same oil I got before and it is definitely not lavender like it’s supposed to be and says on the bottle. It smells disgusting and I’m very ticked off about it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap and smells like it's really old.
customer_reviews.text: Thought most said it smelled good and was a great oil. I would have to disagree it stinks like old oil . I wouldn't dare use this on my wife body at all.
customer_reviews.author: articcolds

customer_reviews.title: Leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Came spilled all over the inside of my box which had other items in it as well so I am not happy .
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: and I'm very disappointed: / Specially about the strong bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this massage oil, and I'm very disappointed:/ Specially about the strong bad smell. Sorry to say, It wasn't relaxing....instead I got a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Md dastagir

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaks, be prepared!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product and already disappointed. There was oil all over the bottle, the bubble wrap baggie it was in was drenched, it even leaked through the baggie into the box. I thought maybe there wasn't a seal, but opened it up to find one, but the oil was leaking out nonstop anyway. The bottle is dark but if I hold it up to a light, I can see a quarter of the oil is already gone!
customer_reviews.author: G Flores

customer_reviews.title: Seal was broken upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: When I opened my package which contained several other items, there was oil everywhere. Upon further inspection the lid was barely tightened and the safety seal was punctured. The scent is tolerable but my wife and I don't care for it nor do we want to use a product that may or may not have been tampered with. Also this item is not eligible for returns or else I would have returned it rather than write this review. Accidents happen but come on.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Order from this Vendor
customer_reviews.text: I just received my bottle today and when I took it out of the package, the bottle had spilt in the packaging and it was oil everywhere. Not to mention the scent is very potent and off putting. I went to return this product I received maybe an hour ago that I just opened and I wasn't able to. I do not recommend you buying products from this vendor. You spend your money, receive a bad product and can't return it. Terrible Product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Smith

customer_reviews.title: It arrived leaking, and for me it was just okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for me. I did feel unlike others said that I needed a little more than expected .. although it did feel very nice and warmed up fast. However, my bottle also arrived leaking, so because I'd rather not go through a whole ordeal, I just kept it. Also, am I the only one who feels fooled by the fact that the bottle says Honeydew but nothing about it smells or is honeydew-like? I thought it was kind of weird, but either way the Lavender is a little bit strong. I won't be buying more of this.
customer_reviews.author: Karena R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blend
customer_reviews.text: It's not too oily and it's not sticky. It also lasts forever! A little goes a long way! I am in love with this oil. I was nervous about it at first because I thought it was a lot of money to risk on massage oil but I am so glad I did. It's worth every penny! I use it for everything! It has replaced my nighttime lotion routine. I don't recommend it for day time because it IS oil and will stain your work clothes but I promise it is awesome for nighttime because it soaks in really well. Slow... But really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kirmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this massage oil. It is not overly greasy and really does help with sore and achey muscles. The scent is just amazing and really lingers and lasts on your skin. The bottle size is quite large and it lasts a long time. I do wish there was a pump bottle because i do not like having to open the cap etc. i would recommend this product and hope to try others from this line
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very sexy and smooth and smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This massage oil immediately smells fantastic. It is very soft and feels really good in your hands, it feels fantastic for a body massage. And it just makes it very smooth and sensual especially when there’s two bodies rubbing together from it! I will buy this product more, the price is great. The quality is fantastic. Both of us are very very happy with that! I will buy this product more, the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil For Your Health
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this oil for my daily use. I'm an outdoor person and my skin needs some additional love on a daily basis. I love using this oil after my shower or bath. My husband rubs my feet every night when I get home and it is perfect for that and it doesn't leave my feet oily. The scent is relaxing lavender and not too overpowering. A little goes a long way and I will happily continue to purchase this oil along with other products from Maple Holistics. Cheers to doing it right!
customer_reviews.author: Trees For Life

customer_reviews.title: The scent is so relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan of the smell of lavender. This massage oil though has a very subtle scent of lavender so it's not over bearing. We used this oil a lot while I was pregnant due to obvious back pain. This felt amazing! What I love the most is the was no sticky residue afterwards it just gets soaked up in your skin but it doesn't leave it irritated. That being said I don't feel like you need to reapply this oil a lot. It's like the oil knows when you're no longer getting a massage because it stays activated until you're done. I would definitely buy this again once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Great for massages
customer_reviews.text: My spouse and I really like this oil. It provides a good scent, smooths the skin, and does not leave you Feeling sticky. The only thing we don’t like is that getting the oil from this kind of bottle leaves the bottle oily. It would be perfect if the oil was dispensed with a pump.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Hands like butter = solid 7 = magic!
customer_reviews.text: So I haven't really used any other massage oils, but this one was debated with another one when I purchased it, but I am glad I went with this bc it is pretty awesome. Took my massage I give my wife from like a solid 3 to a solid 7. Hands glide right over her back. A little goes a long way, like this will last us quite a long time. I'm not one for a lavender scent, but the scent on this is subtle and pleasant, not overpowering...my wife loves the scent which u will admit is a relaxing scent. The oil absorbs well into the skin. Yeah I like this stuff a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothing, non greasy, smells good
customer_reviews.text: It smelled just like lavender to me, not as much of the almond or jojoba came through but it was a nice relaxing smell for a back and leg massage. I didn't feel greasy afterward but did have a nice, non overpowering lavender smell to my skin. I would definitely recommend this product and can say a little goes a long way so this bottle will probably start to spoil before I am even able to use it all. Great price and great product.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent massage oil
customer_reviews.text: For me, there are several things that are important when looking for massage oil products and this one has them all. First, the oil has to be smooth and good for massage, and this is great oil with the perfect consistency. Second, the scent needs to be pleasant, and this lavender smells strong enough to be relaxing without being overpowering. Finally, I want a bottle that is easy to use. The spout of this bottle allows me to easily control how much oil I’m pouring into my hand before applying it to my partners body. This product was a great purchase and worth a try if you’re looking for a great massage oil.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Schoenberger

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product Worth Using.
customer_reviews.text: Used this with my girlfriend and we both love it! It was calming, relaxing, and smelled great. It didn't dry out our skin and once the oil heated up by working it in, it did it's job perfectly. Very much worth it. One bottle is more than enough. I used a generous amount on her and it barely made a dent in the bottle. Check it out because it feels way better than dry hands for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Digital_Furry

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for its purpose.. probably not edible lol has a tarte taste. We all know what it’s for.. The smell is kinda nice but not strong. I would order this again but maybe try a new scent.. it seemed like I was using a good amount during massage and wiped off pretty well. A light residue that easily washes off in a shower. Skin felt a little smoother.
customer_reviews.author: whitney

customer_reviews.title: Awful scent
customer_reviews.text: The smell is awful I threw it in the trash, smell like something older people use for joint pain and swelling
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Murphy-Barnes

customer_reviews.title: The scent is just right, but beware of broken caps
customer_reviews.text: This has been the go-to massage oil that I use. The oil is not stick and it doesn’t leave much residue once absorbed. The scent is not too powerful but it gives off a nice mild lavender scent that is honestly just right. My only complaint, as with many others, is that the cap can easily break. The cap itself just needs to be replaced. I’ve bought two bottles so far and it’s always the cap that leads to spills if not taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite massage oil!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a trained masseuse and this is her favorite oil to use. I'm lucky enough to get a lot of her massages and it's my favorite oil too! It is somehow relaxing yet invigorating, clean yet rich. When we run out and have to use a different oil, we're both immediately disappointed. Make sure to keep an extra bottle on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Stairwei

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelmingly Aggressive Smell
customer_reviews.text: This just doesn't feel like a high quality product. The texture and feel of this massage oil is fine, but I simply cannot get over the smell. On the surface the smell is a pleasant (albeit generic and kind of fake-smelling) lavender. However, as I started giving my boyfriend a back massage the "stingyness" of the smell just hit me. It was of like there was something chemical about the massage oil. Sometimes it felt like I was smelling alcohol. Although the massage oil itself is fine, the smell is VERY powerful. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IF YOU ARE SENSITIVE TO SMELLS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Lavender Smelling
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing relaxing about this scent. Lavender can be a tricky smell when ordering online. Tried to return but it says not returnable. Can't handle the smell so it will be hitting the trash can. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Smilin

customer_reviews.title: Too strong
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the smell! It was too overpowering. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Has a primary lavender smell/feel, though containing other oils. Not sure why it doesn't speak much of the benefits it does for the skin compared to other HoneyDews oils. Perhaps this one has no vitamins but the others do? Not sure. Works as great massage oil though. I'd recommend it to anyone, but may first encourage them to look to purchase the other oils with more vitamins and oils, and with a less ambiguous description.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ingredients and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the scent of this oil is to die for; it smells so good!! I purchased this oil over the others available because of the amazing ingredients. If you’re contemplating which oil will be most nourishing for your skin, the answer is this one. Do your research if you must. If you’re anything like me, you will... and you’ll end up purchasing this delightful bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Collin & Rebekah Pahle

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money, all their products are good
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth bottle from Maple Hollistics, I love love love their massage oils because they are super hydrating and it doesn’t irritate my husband’s skin. It the best massage oil that I’ve tried ever. It lasts me a while too and I use it almost on a daily basis. It helps me really work out the knots in my husband’s back and helps me relieve his lower back pain (sciatica). 20/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhaela

customer_reviews.title: Decent product - overwhelmingly lavendar
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this product over others primarily because of the scent. I wanted something relaxing that gave off a more sensual smell than just lavender. On that front I was disappointed. The smell is overwhelmingly lavender and overpowers the other fragrances. As far as it's purpose as a massage oil it's great. The consistency is runnier than others I have tried but that isn't necessarily a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Old bottle maybe no Scent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received a massage oil about a month ago and I have used it several times. Quite disappointed in the fact that it does not have a scent, which is important to the massage aspect. Maybe mine was an old bottle and the sand had run out. Also tried He being a bit in the microwave to warm it up in the bottle melted. Would be nice in a glass bottle. Overall oil maintains it smoothness throughout massage. Just disappointed about no scent.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Jack

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible scent, or bad batch. It smells of a very strong chemical almost rancid... pretty much useless
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Valleroy

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great massage oil! I wasn’t sure about it as it popped up as an add on, BUT To my pleasant surprise it was smooth, lightly scented and not a cocoanut oil base! My guy is allergic to cocoanut so I have to be very careful about what I use to give him a back rub with! If you don’t like the oil residue it is easily cleaned up off the skin with a hot cloth! It’s not gross and thick. I think it’s a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: The stuff smells soooooo good! I bought this for my fiancé being that he has such dry skin, as well as consistently uses his muscles throughout the day. He absolutely loves it. Said the smell isn’t overwhelming, and is super relaxing. Also really likes the fact that is gives somewhat of a warming sensation when being used. Left his skin feeling well moisturized and not the typical greasy / oil residue that most oils do. I accidentally purchased two and he told me not to return the other one!! We got the lavender scented and it had a woodsy aroma to it.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Russell

customer_reviews.title: Husbands take note
customer_reviews.text: This oil is fantastic. It smells great and glides on like silk. It also absorbs right in after a while not making the skin feel greasy. I bought it for my wife for Christmas and she loves it. A must have for the husbands that have to give weekly or nightly massages.
customer_reviews.author: charlie warren

customer_reviews.title: A DEFINITE REORDER....RELAXING & FUNCTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: This product has a spectacular fragrance, consistency and longevity when using it for massaging sore muscles after a tough day or if you are looking for a great overall massage oil for other uses. You cannot go wrong. I always feel so relaxed after using it. Also try applying after shower before heading to bed for the night...always helps me get a better night's sleep. Try it! You will not be disappointed and will not be surprised if you reorder soon thereafter.
customer_reviews.author: BLUEYZCT

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff came and the seal under the cap was partially opened. The scent is awful! I couldn’t tell you how well it works because I refuse to try it based on it being open and how it smells. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product a year ago and just received a new bottle. The new formula is very oily, almost like Vegetable oil on the skin. Wife is breaking out with this new bottle of oil. The previous bottle was fantastic and left the skin soft and moisturized. Didn’t open the new bottle until after the date to return or would have returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Totally buying it again :)
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. The scent is great, and it's not overpowering like some other products. The scent also kind of lessens after you rub it in, which is great because I wouldn't want my sheets smelling of it days after i use it. It has a nice smooth feel to it and a little goes a long way. I'm definitely going to buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssax3

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottle - Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Bottle came leaking with the seal somehow still untouched. However, most of the oil was still in the bottle so I decided I’d just wipe off what had leaked all over the bottle instead of returning it. I’ve used the product only once and half the bottle is gone. It’s still leaking somewhere but I can’t seem to find it. I feel ripped off. Avoid this massage oil, not worth the hassle. Update: couldn’t even return the oil if I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Evan S.

customer_reviews.title: Non-Greasy, Low-Odor, and Mouth-Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Very slippery and a little goes a long way. Careful about dripping in the shower -- you will slip! After massage leaves skin soft and only lightly scented. Says non-edible, but all ingredients are safe and as long as you don't drink the stuff, you can use your mouth however you want. Also very soothing to freshly shaved skin.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: This oil has got your back
customer_reviews.text: Wipe this out and BAM, the room smells good and someone will most likely feel good too. Pair this with lavender candles to double down on the lavender aroma and you can't go wrong. I would definitely recommend this oil as reducing friction between a hand and a back will take your massages from ordinary to extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Some Random Guy

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: First off - seller was great, I got this item on time, 'twas packaged well etc. Regarding the product - I used it as a hair oil mask because my hair gets super dry during the winter months. Unfortunately, I ended up breaking out on my face a few days after I washed it out of my hair. It took about a month for the breakouts to subside. It was definitely this product - nothing else in my routine changed. I have never used a jojoba oil product before, I think that must be the culprit for me, which is unfortunate because my hair responded well to it. If your skin is very sensitive just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Aimee L

customer_reviews.title: You will either love or hate this scent !!
customer_reviews.text: And we love it !!! My very picky hubby loved the feel and smell of this massage oil. Not to mentioned it really moisturized his dry feet. The aroma is very distinct and just happen to remind us of a great romantic getaway night we had with a similar smelling product In the hotel room. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: V. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not As Shown
customer_reviews.text: Have to say I was very disappointed with this product. The picture showed that it came with a box but then there was none when I received it. Since I was giving it to a lady friend I thought the box would be a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Feel and Smell BUT
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I loved this. The smell was good, the feel was fine, and overall it was great. She wasn't allergic. Easy to clean off. HOWEVER, as a fair warning, the packaging is less than spectacular. I made note to secure it before storing it in an overnight bag, and the WHOLE THING EXPLODED. Note that it doesn't come out of clothing either. Tons of stains, got all over the floor. This was more than partly operator error, but just a warning. Other than that, fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: This massage oil is good for ... massage.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, that headline was a little silly. This is the first massage oil I have purchased but I am happy with the smell and it did not stain my sheets. (although I use oxy-clean and color safe bleach all the time) My partner also loved the smell, but he loved the massage even MORE because of this nice oil.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bottle was leaking
customer_reviews.text: Head up guys! I got the product in time, unfortunately the bottle was leaking! I got only 1/2 of the entire bottle! No option the return it. The product smells good and it has a nice thick concentration, but the fact that I got only half of the product and no answer from the seller I am going to provide only 1 star!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy M

customer_reviews.title: Not packaged Properly
customer_reviews.text: The item spilled into the box, because it wasnt sealed in any way and there was no product box like shown in the picture. Outside of having to clean up the mess and dispose of the oil drenched box, The product smells great and works well for massages. I just hope they do better with packaging and maybe work on a plastic seal for the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product smells amazing BUT it would be better if it didnt leak all inside the packaging! The whole bottle and wrapping it was in is completely covered in the oil. I would enjoy it more if it came with a full and clean bottle.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: I get migraines a lot, and I enjoy rubbing something that is lavender scented onto my neck and shoulders when I have a headache. I decided to try this oil since it had good reviews. I'm pleased with the purchase. The oil works as one would expect, and the scent is strong, but pleasing. I think if you smell it while in the bottle you don't really get the lavender vibe, but you can definitely smell it on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moser

customer_reviews.title: Smell is too strong!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have any issues with the way this product came packaged, it didn’t leak out like it did for many others but the smell was waaay too strong! I couldn’t imagine having a full body massage with this oil. It would be like wearing a full bottle of cologne. The smell was also more masculine than feminine. When it comes to moisture the oil absorbed right into the skin and left no shine, not what I was looking for but might be right for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Blushing Doll

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has a lot of upper back and neck pain caused by his job so I bought this massage oil to assist me when I give him back massages. I was a little weary at first because some massage oils have too strong of scents and tend to leave a sticky residue. However, this product is wonderful! It smells nice, moisturizes the skin, and it doesn’t leave any sticky residue on your skin. It is, by far, my favorite massage oil to use. And my boyfriend loves when I use this on his back.
customer_reviews.author: Mason VH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome!! I absolutely love it and would highly recommend. I was worried at first because I have very sensitive skin but this didn't cause me to break out at all. The lavender smell is great and not too over bearing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to calm down tension
customer_reviews.text: I've never used essential oils before, so I was a bit hesitant to order something online without testing it. But I'm really happy with this lavender oil. Although I'm not crazy over the lavender scent it has such a soothing effect, that I use it all the time. It's a wonderful moisturizer, not too oily, just right. I pour it into my tub and spray my bedding with it, too. Whenever I feel stressed out or overwhelmed I grab the bottle and I just inhale the scent. It really calms me down and relaxes my tension. I will certainly buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle or not sealed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bottle leaked everywhere inside of the box on my other items on same delivery. Either a broken seal on bottle or it cracked somehow. I haven't figured it out yet, but it arrived today and made a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Shahanaz Perveen

customer_reviews.title: Great massage oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this massage oil for its scent, texture, and all natural ingredients. I used it to mix with castor oil since castor oil is really good for the skin but very sticky. A little bit goes a long way. Will definitely purchase again. It doesn't relieve pain but sure doesn't cause any either.
customer_reviews.author: Chy Mauria

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging; bad smell
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived opened. So it leaked in my box over other items I had shipped. It also smelled bad. I was expecting a sweet smell since it said honeydew. But it was anything but a sweet smell.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: The scent is offensive/not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. The only thing I smell with this is tee tree oil. Teatree oil is not an ingredient in this product but I know exactly what that smells like; it’s a very distinct and strong smell. That’s the first thing I thought of when I opened this massage oil. I don’t know if I received a faulty bottle or what, but very unhappy. Can not return.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: mysterious leak
customer_reviews.text: I did read the reviews before I purchased this. As others have said, when it arrives it is clear it leaked from somewhere. In my case, I still have a full bottle and I can't really tell where it leaked from but the box was wet from the leaking. I haven't used it yet so I can't comment on whether it is a good product. I do with it had a better seal.
customer_reviews.author: carmens kindle 3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice - me and my partner both like it. It feels really good on your skin, and it smells nice - not too overpowering, the lavender is well balanced with the other scents. The feel of it on your skin lasts through a shower, but in a good way - it doesn't rub off onto the sheets afterwards but does keep the skin feeling smooth. We sometimes warm a bit up and add some cocoa butter for extra skin benefits, just in case you need a way to vary it up - the bottle lasts quite a long time :)
customer_reviews.author: Shaharazade Ramkumar

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy, You Won't Regret It!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it smells, I bought it to help with my arthritis pain for both my wrists and knees. Helps make it a lot easier to massage without having to worry about the afterwards smell. And I love the fact that it's made from natural ingredients. Most definitely recommend it. Will be buying again once I run out :)
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great for massage
customer_reviews.text: Love this massage oil. The smell and feeling are just what I needed. It's a great product for a great price. I'm getting it the second time and not regretting
customer_reviews.author: Shlomi from New York

customer_reviews.title: Ideal massage oil- This brand never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: If you like the smell of lavender and are looking for a massage oil, look no further. The smell is very pleasant and not too strong. The oil does what it's supposed to and it makes massaging much easier. Gives the skin just the right amount of lubrication. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Out of Bottle Experience
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't even able to use due to the bottle leaking all over the place and getting on the rest of my items in the package thankfully nothing was damaged by this oil spill just out my money; brightside it smelled good
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: A Great Massage Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a great massage oil. The lavender scent is bold, but not over powering. The scent is just enough to elicit a feeling of calm. The oil itself has nice consistency. Not too thin, where is runny. But also not too thick too become sticky. It always my hands to glide across the skin, without any drag. As long as too much oil isn't applied, it leaves a nice moisturized feeling on the skin Overall, this is one of the better massage oils I have used. Especially at a price point well below other massage oils i have tried. I will definitely purchase this oil again
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: RUINED MY FRIDAY NIGHT
customer_reviews.text: When i ordered this, i was so excited to get it. Today I recieved the product (it's friday so I was definitely planning on using it.) But when i opened the package, the lid was not sealed so the oil was every where. Ruined my plans.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Can't return product
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged and most of the product leaked out. I now have less than 1/4th of a bottle for the price of a full one. Very upsetting since this product is not eligible for return. But as far as the quality goes it seems to be ok, sticky though. I like that it is all natural and baby safe. I put this on my daughter after a bath and she falls asleep. Better to buy something from a store than to purchase a product without a return policy. I will make sure to check for that next time I think about buying something online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Best massage oil ever it goes a long way. I bought this so that my husband and I could use it on each other (TMI I KNOW) but it was great. The smell was not super strong but just enough to where it felt like you were actually at a massage place. I will say be careful if you are traveling because it does open a little, but you need this!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & smells great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Accidentally ordered 2 bottles but glad I did now. Smells awesome. We sit it in some hot water to warm it up before using so neither of us get the shock treatment. Warming it by rubbing hands together adds needless time to the fun at hand.
customer_reviews.author: RRHoop

customer_reviews.title: Strong Scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent was NOT sexy at all. It’s a very strong lavender. It smells like essential oils .. since the bottle was for sensual massages I was expecting a softer smell that would get me and my boyfriend more hot and bothered but we are in our late 20’s and we like sweeter smells. I’ll try vanilla next time. However, this leaves no residue and is great for massages, the scent is not for us though.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Arrived With Damaged Bottle
customer_reviews.text: The massage oil itself is great. The smell is very pleasant and not overpowering. It does leave your hands greasy and you will need to shower the product off your body or you will feel gross. When it arrived in the mail, the bottle was open and there was massage oil leaking all over the box. This company really needs to work on their product packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jamison

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST greasless,  absorbing, fragrant, skin softening oil in the world!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different oils. Most are greasy and then turn sticky.... yuck! BUT Maple Holistics oil...... AMAZEBALLS! Soft .... silky..... absorbing.... and it smells like heaven. I have 2 scents and I can never make up my mind which to use, the relaxing or sensual! I usually end up using the sensual to relax hahaha! I wont buy any other brand from here on out! Thank you MH!!
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: be careful
customer_reviews.text: be aware you can't return, Mine arrived with loose cap and spilled all over the container. Really pungent smell if you like it strong. Sorry i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: b. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the most sensual of massages
customer_reviews.text: SOMETIMES... a massage can lead to other activity so it’s nice to have a massage oil that won’t offend the sensitive parts. What I appreciate most is the ingredients are all natural and, if you happen to be in a position where you end up with it in your mouth, it doesn’t taste or feel like oil.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice smell
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this massage oil not knowing what to expect, but I saw many good reviews so I gave it a try. I am glad I did, because this is the best massage oil I've ever had. The smell is amazing. It is not overpowering and very relaxing. The oil also feels good on the skin. Will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Adriel Romo

customer_reviews.title: Smells doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom, she gets massages done pretty often, and was looking for a new oil. I bought her this one, it smells good, the problem is that the smell doesn’t last! You have to apply more oil in order to smell it. I always buy oils from The Body Shop and they do it’s job perfectly, can’t say the same from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amara

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband- it smells a little strong but I can get past it- I use this to massage his back and he loves it! But I didn’t think all the way through my purchase- since it’s a decent size bottle I will be rubbing his back all year long! In face it’s now almost October and the bottle is still half full!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smell, great massage oil
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for myself and a couple of clients who like an aromatherapy. After applying the oil on a skin, it observes easy and in the same time provides a good lasting lubrication, love it. Oil’s smell is nice, not strong – just pleasant. The product is exactly like it describes in “About the Product” section “Formulated with a perfect balance of carrier oils for balanced absorbency (absorption rate not too fast, not too slow) which is non-staining, easy to apply and a naturally therapeutic body moisturizer, skin and muscle lubricant..” I and my clients like a feel & smell of this great oil.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Poor Lubrication
customer_reviews.text: This masssage oil is very sticky to use and essentially worthless for us. I am not sure what it is good for.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Warren

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Get the cheapest body oil at the market, definitely be better than this.. no pain relief, poor scent..
customer_reviews.author: Akram Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Great massage oil!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a massage oil that would not leave a stain on sheets and thankfully, this fits the bill. Fortunately, the scent was not overpowering and was pleasant enough, because otherwise, that would definitely be an issue. Ultimately, this fit everything I was looking for and works well as a massage oil. It has the bonus of being all natural, because who needs more chemicals considering all the ones already in our environment?!
customer_reviews.author: BrettB

customer_reviews.title: Needs proper sealing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this oil, some candy, and a card for my boyfriend for Valentine's Day. I received it today in a bag and the bag was oily. I opened the package and my card and candy were soaked with oil. There was no box or a safety seal. The bottle had leaked half of the oil and the bottle was unscrewed. I'm not very happy about my other gifts being ruined but the oil at least smelled nice. 😑 If you order this product...order it seperately from other things or they will be ruined.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Half the bottle leaked and ruined other things in box
customer_reviews.text: Product was not sealed and leaked everywhere, including on other stuff I bought. I can’t return or request a new bottle!!
customer_reviews.author: megan sewell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - Fragrance just okay
customer_reviews.text: The smell does not seem right. It does have nothing like lavender nor almond. The package did not come in the box as advertise. Seems I bought something very cheap. Maybe I was expecting a better smell. It is not bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Never received.
customer_reviews.text: 100% disappointed. My package was delivered opened and then taped shut without this product inside. & I have no way of requesting a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

product_meta.title: Sensual Massage Oil with Relaxing Lavender Almond Oil and Jojoba for Men and Women – 100% Natural Hypoallergenic Skin Therapy with No Artificial or Added Ingredients - Made by Maple Holistics
feature_bullets: 100% natural sensual massage oil women and men with relaxing pure lavender pure jojoba and almond oil with Vitamin E.

Formulated with perfect balance of carrier oils for balanced absorbency (absorption rate not too fast not too slow) which is non-staining easy to apply and a naturally therapeutic body moisturizer skin and muscle lubricant.

Rich in aromatic compounds which denote sensuality the natural properties of Bulgarian Lavender Essential Oil synergizes with Jojoba and Almond to create a sensual and intimate massage oil blend that exhilarates passion sex and improves massage ability. Together the oil blend promotes deep tissue softness while providing natural slip and the perfect absorbency without greasy residue buildup.

Contains only 100% pure therapeutic-grade oils – free of any additives! Silicone free paraben free preservative free and contains no ingredients which contribute to greasiness and staining. Hypoallergenic for sensitive skin and great for men and women alike. Perfect for at-home massage therapy or as a couples gift set.

Made in a state-of-the-art facility in the USA which exceeds all GMP standards. Therapeutic pure and sensational Honeydew Products relaxing Sensual Massage Oil is assured to exceed expectations in quality and effectiveness - 100% money-back guaranteed!
